name: [+18] Cyberpunk 2069
description:
Another short game where you just walk on the map having fun with the people you encounter on the way.

Afther complete all objectives you dont see an "ending", you can keep walking on the map and do all again.

LEFT/RIGHT = Move
Space/Hold Space = Jump
A/Enter = Action
TAB = Collection 
F2 = Restart the game

PS: I am already planning games with history, long duration and more features.
PS²: I need to choose better controls for keyboard _ _|l|
